meta.name: dc:Title
meta.content: Drunk man steals tractor and leaves a trail of destruction in German town

frontmatter.doctitle: Drunk man steals tractor and leaves a trail of destruction in German town

level1.h1: Drunk man steals tractor and leaves a trail of destruction in German town
level1.p: A drunk 23-year-old man from Radevormwald, Germany, stole a tractor last night and left a trail of destruction in the town. The tractor was equipped with a four-meter-wide snowplow, write German media.

He caused nearly 100,000 euros in damage to buildings and vehicles in the municipality in the state of North Rhine-Westphalia. Among other things, he rammed a facade of a house, a fence, a garage and five cars. A 46-year-old driver was slightly injured in the collision with a car.
Around 7:30 PM, the police received calls from the uproar. The man left the tractor in a supermarket parking lot. Police found the man there, still under the influence, near the tractor.
